ygData.subject: Re: Pickled Gator and Lizard  and jars
ygData.msgSnippet: Your lucky I m also a potter you would have been better off posting this in the Baking list. But to answer you question, you forgot the jug of sauces Pickle
ygData.messageBody:
Your lucky I'm also a potter you would have been better off posting this in
the Baking list.

But to answer you question, you forgot the jug of sauces

Pickle [Meat] = [Meat] + Vineger + Jug of Sauces

hope this helpes.


----- Original Message -----
From: "Danny Shaffer" <jdshaffer@...>
To: "EQ_Potters" <EQ_Potters@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, December 11, 1999 5:22 AM
Subject: [EQ_Potters] Pickled Gator and Lizard and jars


> From: "Danny Shaffer" <jdshaffer@...>
>
> Ok, I collected 20 or so "gator meats" from DW crocs and camains in S.RO,
> and picked up some lizard meat from various vendors. I finally get back to
> Neriak with visions preparing some pickled gator to let soak for a little
> while.. Put the gator meat and viniger in the oven, and BAM! Items do not
> combine ! Same with lizard.
>
> Tried adding water to the mix, no luck..
>
> the recipe book says to use a jar, but have heard otherwise in the mailing
> list, was wondering if they changed this with the new patch? I didn't get
a
> chance to actually make a jar to experiment, since Neriak doesn't have
> sketches, and didn't feel like walking to east commons..
>
> Any ideas? I got all this gator meat rotting in the bank, and don't want
to
> make steaks from it, since they are trivial.. Not sure if the pickled
> stuff is or not, but sure sounds tasty.. :)
>
>
